doc.title: Justice League

credit.role: Nathaniel Adams/Captain Atom/Sir Justin Arthur/Shining Knight/Warden
John Stewart/Green Lantern/Lorder Green Lantern/John Henry Irons/Steel
J'onn J'onzz/The Martian Manhunter/Lorder J'onn J'onzz

doc.plot: Forces of evil, chaos, and destruction await. Not even protectors like Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, Green Lantern, the Flash, Hawkgirl or the Martian Manhunter may have a chance alone. But together as the Justice League, they are a metahuman force (and a hope) to be reckoned with.
